yelp_reviews.author: Gabi M.
yelp_reviews.review: Hey there Robin! I tried to call the number you have on your sign and online and it isn't going through. Do you have another number I can reach you at. Wanted to ask you aboit a property you have available in La Conner

yelp_reviews.author: Kenny E.
yelp_reviews.review: By far the worst renting agency I've ever rented from. Was late or negligent in fixing anything. Rude, inattentive, slum Lord. Do yourself a favor and rent from an owner directly, or from anyone else. Awful. Whoever gave her a business license needs to be fired.

yelp_reviews.author: Horrible B.
yelp_reviews.review:
Let's just start out if I could give The Rent Lady a 0 star I would. Robin is a horrible property manager. She has not fixed a single thing she was supposed to when moving in. It took 7 months for her to come and fix our deck. And she told me to get some. Nails and a hammer and fix the lower one myself. She doesn't answer her phone and always claims she is too busy. When dropping rent off to her house her housemate was smoking weed in her office. Her professionals who came to fix my deck that was leaking. Used our trash and painted over dirt and leaves before washing it down. It's been two days and the paint is already peeling! She has yet to fix our fireplace, the house was dirty when we moved in...she told us we could clean it ourselves. She shows up unannounced and walks into your backyard without notice! I absolutely would not recommend her. You have to call her at least 6 times before she answers. 


She also says that propane is a unspoken rule although it isn't on our lease. 


Hmmmm... I thought leases were straight forward.

yelp_reviews.author: Jason T.
yelp_reviews.review: we have rented from Robin for 9 years she is by far the nicest person we have rented from. I pay cash early ever month for the rent and we have had no problems getting anything fixed that needed fixed. We hope to continue working with Robin as our landlord for a long time to come

yelp_reviews.author: Jason N.
yelp_reviews.review: Mary Unser at The Rent Lady has been kind, thorough, and accommodating - among the best property management contacts we've had the pleasure to work with. All questions have been responded to quickly and everything has been handled with the utmost professionalism. If you are looking to rent a property under their care I would highly recommend them.

yelp_reviews.author: Crystal M.
yelp_reviews.review: If I could I would give her no stars... Robin (Owner) was in charge of looking after our house. After the tenants moved out with out 20 day notice that was stated they had to give in the contract. They had done some damages to our house. Robin repeatedly denied that the tenants did the damages. She gave them back the whole deposit. So, when I came up to inspect the house and do some work to it. There was a bunch of damage that wasn't listed on there walk thru list. I asked her about it and she kept denying that the last tenants did this damage. Well she brought over some pictures of the house before they moved in. Well, those pictures proofed her wrong. There was no damages shown in the pictures that she said the previous tenant did. Now were out a thousand dollars because she didn't do her job correctly. Her job that she kept telling me that she was too busy for.... She has yet to contact us about reimbursing us for the damages.

summary.text:
Good

The company, Rent Lady, has had some shining moments according to user reviews. For instance, one user review expressed heartfelt gratitude for nearly a decade of satisfactory service, noting the property manager as the nicest person they've rented from. This user highlighted timely responsiveness to maintenance requests and a pleasant ongoing relationship with the landlord, illustrating Rent Lady's potential to forge long-term, hassle-free tenancies. Another positive review echoed this sentiment, praising a contact from Rent Lady for her kindness, thoroughness, and professionalism. The reviewer felt that all of their questions were promptly addressed and that their interactions with the company exemplified high professional standards—characteristics likely to encourage prospective tenants.

Great

The attributes of the company are further reinforced by tenants who appreciate the personal touch provided by Rent Lady's staff. Specific team members received acclaim for their accommodating nature, with one user review specifically mentioning the ease and satisfaction of communicating with the staff regarding rental matters. These positive experiences with staff members suggest that when Rent Lady hits the mark, they leave a lasting good impression that can greatly benefit the tenant's overall experience and satisfaction with their living environment.

Bad

However, not all user reviews of Rent Lady glow with positivity. One user review relays a frustrating account of alleged negligence, where essential maintenance issues were purportedly ignored or delayed, including a critical seven-month wait to repair a deck. Furthermore, there's mention of a lack of professionalism, with unannounced property visits and a housemate observed smoking weed in the office. Such experiences, as shared by this reviewer, are worrisome as they reflect poorly on the company's supposed commitments to timeliness and professionalism.

Ugly

Amplifying the concerns are user reviews that speak of even more severe issues. In a troubling narrative, one former tenant described experiencing repeated denial from the property manager regarding tenant-caused damages, culminating in monetary losses when the entire safety deposit was returned to the previous occupants. The user reviews mentioned mismanagement and a failure to uphold contractual agreements. This grievance hints at significant shortcomings in Rent Lady's management practices, potentially impacting trust and credibility amongst clients and tenants alike.
